data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1.1 Dev Beta 3
data.actual_result: Backticks disappear in the channel topic above the member list
data.expected_result: Backticks are visible in both channel topic locations
data.short_description: Single-backtick codeblocks in channel topics show as normal text but with the backticks removed in the channel topic above the member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a channel with a single-backtick codeblock, such as the bug-approval-queue - Observe how the backticks are displayed in the channel topic when viewing channel settings - Observe how the backticks disappear in the channel topic above the member list
